caption.p: The predicted seasonal growth coefficients from the von Bertalanffy growth analyses for Plethodon cinereus in Laurel, MD, USA. Striped mean growth (solid black) is not different from lead‐backed growth (gray) in any of the four seasons (“A” autumn, “W” winter, “Sp” spring, and “Sm” summer). Means are presented as squares with 95% Bayesian credible intervals as segments
